metadata.title: CVE-2023-52850 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: hantro: Check whether reset op is defined before useThe i.MX8MM/N/P does not define the .reset op since reset of the VPU isdone by genpd. Check whether the .reset op is defined before calling itto avoid NULL pointer dereference.Note that the Fixes tag is set to the commit which removed the reset opfrom i.MX8M Hantro G2 implementation, this is because before this commitall the implementations did define the .reset op.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
